items.sentence: I think you\'ll want to contact Tom as soon as possible.
You don\'t believe that Tom did that on purpose, do you?
You don\'t get up as early as your older sister, do you?
She tells him to give her all of his salary and he does.
Since there were no customers, we closed the shop early.
Thank you for doing the cooking while I was sick in bed.
That tall building across the street is where Tom works.
Tom wrote the song that Mary sang last night at the pub.
Tom thought that what Mary wrote didn\'t make any sense.
Tom told Mary he thought she wasn\'t a very good driver.
Tom told Mary that he\'d gone to the beach that weekend.
Tom told Mary that she shouldn\'t walk alone after dark.
Unless you can speak French, they won\'t understand you.
We need to find out who he is and who he\'s working for.
We\'re expecting a lot of people to attend the ceremony.
Everybody\'s talking about what happened at the meeting.
Is there someplace around here that can fix a flat tire?
Is there something in particular that you want to study?
It is hard for an old man to change his way of thinking.
It was impossible for the boy to swim across that river.
